name: Gmail
natural_language_description: 这是 Gmail 节点。主要用于: Consume the Gmail API

oldVersionNotice.displayName: New node version available: get the latest version with added features from the nodes panel.
oldVersionNotice.name: oldVersionNotice
oldVersionNotice.natural_language_description: 参数名: New node version available: get the latest version with added features from the nodes panel.

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 默认值: oAuth2

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: draft

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: add

messageId.name: messageId
messageId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Message ID | (必填项)

includeHtml.name: includeHtml
includeHtml.description: Whether the message should also be included as HTML
includeHtml.natural_language_description: 参数名: HTML | 作用: Whether the message should also be included as HTML | 默认值: False

htmlMessage.name: htmlMessage
htmlMessage.natural_language_description: 参数名: HTML Message | 作用: The HTML message body | (必填项)

message.name: message
message.natural_language_description: 参数名: Message | 作用: Plain text message body | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: dataPropertyAttachmentsPrefixName (值: None) - Prefix for name of the binary property to which to write the attachment. An index starting with 0 will be added. So if name is "attachment_" the first attachment is saved to "attachment_0".
format (值: None) - The format to return the message in
includeSpamTrash (值: None) - Whether to include messages from SPAM and TRASH in the results
labelIds (值: None) - Only return messages with labels that match all of the specified label IDs. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

q (值: None) - Only return messages matching the specified query. Supports the same query format as the Gmail search box. For example, "from:someuser@example.com rfc822msgid:<somemsgid@example.com> is:unread". Parameter cannot be used when accessing the api using the gmail.metadata scope.

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 10

name.name: name
name.natural_language_description: 参数名: Name | 作用: Label Name | (必填项)

labelId.name: labelId
labelId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Label ID | 作用: The ID of the label | (必填项)

labelListVisibility.name: labelListVisibility
labelListVisibility.description: The visibility of the label in the label list in the Gmail web interface
labelListVisibility.natural_language_description: 参数名: Label List Visibility | 作用: The visibility of the label in the label list in the Gmail web interface | 默认值: labelShow | (必填项)

messageListVisibility.name: messageListVisibility
messageListVisibility.description: The visibility of messages with this label in the message list in the Gmail web interface
messageListVisibility.natural_language_description: 参数名: Message List Visibility | 作用: The visibility of messages with this label in the message list in the Gmail web interface | 默认值: show | (必填项)

threadId.name: threadId
threadId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Thread ID | (必填项)

toList.name: toList
toList.description: The email addresses of the recipients
toList.natural_language_description: 参数名: To Email | 作用: The email addresses of the recipients | 默认值: [] | (必填项)

labelIds.name: labelIds
labelIds.description: The ID of the label. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.
labelIds.natural_language_description: 参数名: Label Names or IDs | 作用: The ID of the label. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression. | 默认值: [] | (必填项)
